name: Sockeye
tagline: Branding & Creative for the Thinking Class
description:
Sockeye is an agency of seekers, working with courageous people who aim for a higher purpose. We bring cultural relevance to brands in message, tone, and voice. 
Nuance is everything. 
We deliver a passionately creative point of view, from our home in Portland to our new Creative Consulate in Amsterdam.
